td.span: Initial Public Health Case Report - Pertussis/Zika example

tr.td:
Persistent Cough REPORTED starting on 2016/10/05
Whooping Respiration not reported
Paroxysms Of Coughing REPORTED starting on 2016/11/04
Post-tussive vomiting not reported

Lymphocytes [#/​volume] in Blood by Automated count - Interpretation: High
